code: import{GET_TASKS,GET_TASKS_FAIL,GET_TASKS_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";export var getTasks=function getTasks(){return{type:GET_TASKS};};export var getTasksSuccess=function getTasksSuccess(tasks){return{type:GET_TASKS_SUCCESS,payload:tasks};};export var getTasksFail=function getTasksFail(error){return{type:GET_TASKS_FAIL,payload:error};};
